fields.heading: Hone your Jedi Skills
fields.caption: All members have access to our unique training and achievement ladders. Show off your Star Wars skills, progress through the levels and show everyone who the top Jedi Master is!

fields.heading: Build your Clan
fields.caption: Engage in meaningful conversation, or bloodthirsty battle! If it's related to Star Wars you better believe we do it

fields.heading: Find Love
fields.caption: Everybody knows Star Wars fans are the best mates for Star Wars fans. Find your Princess Leia or Han Solo and explore the stars together.
